siteMetadata.title: Life with a Twist of Lemon

node.excerpt: Dear Listener, Taliesin went in for his big surgery, so we talk about his cone of shame and that experience as a dog owner. Jon finally started watching Ted Lasso, so we can actually talk about it on the podcast. We also feature a milkshake review in this episode! From Frydae in…

frontmatter.title: Ted Lasso, Milkshakes, and Irrigation Systems

node.excerpt: Dear Listener, We have a jam-packed episode today. All the potential of a great anniversary episode but we are still not at one year of Life with a Twist of Lemon. To kick off the episode Jon had a couple of milkshakes on his trip. The first from Hubbard Avenue Diner with a…
